description: I. Guide to local government finance settlement, January 2008. 16 p. II. Year-on-year change in the formula grant for 2008/09, 2009/10 and 2010/11. 39 p. III. Headline allocations for the 2008/09, 2009/10 and 2010/11 settlement. 41 p. IV. Settlement key statistics for 2008/09, 2009/10 and 2010/11 (table 1). 3 p. V. Specific and general grants for 2008/09, 2009/10 and 2010/11 (table 2). 6 p. VI. Adjustments to CSR07 totals: 2007/08, 2008/09 and 2009/10 (table 3). 3 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
